if statement.init: var r, r2; if (true) r=true; else r=false; if (false) r2=false; else r2=true;

another if statement.init: var r, r2; if (1+2===3) r=true; else r=false; if (3 > 4) r2=false; else r2=true;

and another if statement.init: function f() { return true; } var r = '', r2 = 0; if (r+r2 === '0' && f()) { r = r2 = true; } else { r=r2=false; }
